mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, `path`, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFrame,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{visible,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `path` = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_frame = #{isFrame,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, `path`, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, `path`, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_menu

select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, `path`, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_menu where visible = 0 and `status` = 1 order by parent_id, order_num, menu_id

select m.* from sys_menu m, sys_role_menu rm where rm.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and rm.`status` = 1 and m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and m.visible = 0 and m.`status` = 1 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
